sources.title: Buster Keaton's "Hard Luck" (1921)

metadata.Plot: Out of work, Buster tries various ways to commit suicide. At last he tries "poison" from a bottle containing booze. The president of a sporting club speaks of the need for a sportsman to promote the club and drunken Buster gets the job for which he must learn fishing, hunting and riding.
metadata.Actors: Buster Keaton, Virginia Fox, Joe Roberts
